title: Chromas PLZ RIOT
body:
sooo yoo guys teemo here or know as that jinx one trick with weird asf skills as jinx

So rito good job chromas for the D-man ( Dunkmaster darius ) yoo i aint go money to waste on rp and you made chromas 2000ip at one point so my idea is every month when the new chromas come out put last months on for 2000ip thats all for now
